name: The Suits Have Gone Mad!
description:
The Suits Have Gone Mad! is a brand new episodic horror brought to you by Blank Dream Studios. Unravel the mysteries behind the monopoly of Blake & Whitley Innovations and bring color into a dull world.


Learn about the daily life of an employee at Blake & Whitley. Everything will be okay as long as you work hard and stay out of trouble...




A business behemoth in the world, dominating the market in tone production and distribution. Employees are pushed to the limits with little reward.




Theo Blue, an ordinary senior innovator at the company unexpectedly discovers color while working on a typical day. Executives witness this discovery and mysteriously demand for his apprehension.




Business suits search floor to floor, persistent in your capture. Avoid them in any way possible.




From the disappearance of a co-owner to the malicious business ethics, the company has a deep and dark history that they have been hiding...
